question: Which 5 movies have the most detailed plots (based on the length of the plot text)?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.plot IS NOT NULL
RETURN m.title, m.plot
ORDER BY size(m.plot) DESC
LIMIT 5
error: Uses size() on string property - not directly supported

question: Show the top 5 highest IMDb rated movies directed by female directors.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[:DIRECTED]-(d:Person)
WHERE d.name =~ "(?i).*\\b(Ms\\.|Miss|Mrs\\.|Frau|Fräulein|Mademoiselle|Madame|Mlle\\.|Mme\\.|Señora|Señorita|Doña).*"
   OR exists{ (d)-[:ACTED_IN]->(:Movie) }
RETURN m.title AS movie, m.imdbRating AS rating
ORDER BY m.imdbRating DESC
LIMIT 5
error: Uses regex matching pattern

question: Identify the first 3 movies that have been rated by users younger than 25.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[r:RATED]->(m:Movie)
WHERE u.age < 25
RETURN m.title
LIMIT 3
error: Uses user age which doesn't exist in schema

question: Which movies have a plot description longer than 150 characters?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.plot IS NOT NULL AND size(m.plot) > 150
RETURN m.title, m.plot
error: Uses size() on string property - not directly supported

question: What are the top 5 directors who have directed movies that won an academy award?
cypher:
MATCH (d:Director)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)
WHERE m.plot CONTAINS 'Academy Award'
WITH d, count(m) AS awardCount
ORDER BY awardCount DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN d.name AS director, awardCount
error: Uses Award/WON which don't exist in schema

question: List the first 5 movies that have been directed by women.
cypher:
MATCH (director:Person)-[:DIRECTED]->(movie:Movie)
WHERE director.name =~ "(?i).*\\b(Ms\\.|Miss|Mrs\\.|Madam|Madame|Mademoiselle|Frau|Fräulein|Señora|Señorita|Doña|Donna)\\b.*"
RETURN movie.title
LIMIT 5
error: Uses regex matching pattern

question: List the first 5 actors who were born and died in the same country.
cypher:
MATCH (a:Actor)
WHERE a.bornIn IS NOT NULL AND a.bornIn = a.diedIn
RETURN a.name AS actor, a.bornIn AS country
LIMIT 5
error: Uses diedIn which doesn't exist in schema

question: Which three movies have been rated by the youngest users on average?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[r:RATED]-(u:User)
WITH m, avg(u.age) AS avgAge, count(r) AS numRatings
WHERE numRatings > 10
RETURN m.title, avgAge
ORDER BY avgAge
LIMIT 3
error: Uses user age which doesn't exist in schema

question: Which three directors have directed movies that have won any cinematic awards?
cypher:
MATCH (d:Director)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)
WHERE exists{ (m)-[:WON]->(:Award) }
RETURN d.name AS director
LIMIT 3
error: Uses Award/WON which don't exist in schema

question: List the top 3 movies with a released date on a Friday.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE date(m.released).weekday = 5
RETURN m.title, m.released
ORDER BY m.released DESC
LIMIT 3
error: Uses weekday function which has no TypeQL equivalent

question: What are the first 3 movies with a main actor over the age of 50 at the time of filming?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[:ACTED_IN]-(a:Actor)
WHERE date(m.released) - a.born > duration('P50Y')
RETURN m.title, a.name, duration.between(a.born, date(m.released)).years as age
ORDER BY m.released
LIMIT 3
error: Uses duration functions which have no TypeQL equivalent

question: Find all users who rated a movie on its release date.
cypher:
MATCH (u:User)-[r:RATED]->(m:Movie)
WHERE m.released = date(datetime({epochSeconds: r.timestamp}))
RETURN u, r, m
error: Uses epochSeconds which requires timestamp conversion

question: What are the top 5 movies with the highest IMDb rating that have been directed by the same director?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[:DIRECTED]-(d:Director)
WITH d, m
ORDER BY m.imdbRating DESC
WITH d, collect(m)[0..5] AS topMovies
RETURN d.name AS director, [movie IN topMovies | movie.title] AS movies, [movie IN topMovies | movie.imdbRating] AS ratings
error: Uses collect() aggregation which has no direct TypeQL equivalent

question: What are the top 5 movies with the smallest gap between release and rating date?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[r:RATED]-(u:User)
WITH m, r, u, datetime(m.released) AS releasedDate, datetime({epochSeconds: r.timestamp}) AS ratingDate
WITH m, duration.between(releasedDate, ratingDate).days AS daysBetween
ORDER BY daysBetween
LIMIT 5
RETURN m.title AS movie, daysBetween AS daysBetweenReleaseAndRating
error: Uses duration functions which have no TypeQL equivalent

question: What are the first 3 movies with a director who has a bio longer than 500 words?

MATCH (m:Movie)<-[:DIRECTED]-(d:Director)
WHERE size(split(d.bio, ' ')) > 500
RETURN m.title
LIMIT 3
error: Uses size(split()) which has no TypeQL equivalent

question: What are the top 5 movies with the most user ratings received in their first year of release?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[r:RATED]-(u:User)
WHERE datetime(m.released).year = datetime(r.timestamp).year
WITH m, count(r) AS ratingCount
ORDER BY ratingCount DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN m.title AS movie, ratingCount AS ratingsInFirstYear
error: No matching conversion pattern found

question: Which actors have acted in movies that were released on their birthday?
cypher:
MATCH (actor:Actor)-[:ACTED_IN]->(movie:Movie)
WHERE date(movie.released) = date(actor.born)
RETURN actor.name AS actor, movie.title AS movie, movie.released AS releaseDate
error: No matching conversion pattern found

question: Identify directors who directed a movie in the year they were born.
cypher:
MATCH (d:Director)-[:DIRECTED]->(m:Movie)
WHERE m.year = d.born.year
RETURN d.name AS director, m.title AS movie, m.year AS year
error: Uses .year property accessor which has no TypeQL equivalent

question: List the top 5 movies that have a plot description longer than 100 words.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE size(split(m.plot, ' ')) > 100
RETURN m.title, m.plot
ORDER BY size(split(m.plot, ' ')) DESC
LIMIT 5
error: Uses size(split()) which has no TypeQL equivalent

question: Which 3 actors have acted in both a highest and lowest grossing movie?
cypher:
MATCH (a:Actor)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)
WITH a, m
ORDER BY m.revenue DESC
WITH a, collect(m)[0] AS highestGrossingMovie, collect(m)[-1] AS lowestGrossingMovie
WHERE exists{ (a)-[:ACTED_IN]->(highestGrossingMovie) } 
  AND exists{ (a)-[:ACTED_IN]->(lowestGrossingMovie) }
RETURN a.name AS actor, highestGrossingMovie.title AS highestGrossingMovie, lowestGrossingMovie.title AS lowestGrossingMovie
LIMIT 3
error: Uses collect() aggregation which has no direct TypeQL equivalent

question: List the first 3 movies where the main language is not English but have an IMDb rating over 7.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.languages[0] <> 'English' AND m.imdbRating > 7
RETURN m.title, m.languages[0], m.imdbRating
ORDER BY m.imdbRating DESC
LIMIT 3
error: Uses array indexing which has no TypeQL equivalent

question: What are the top 5 movies released in the last 5 years?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.released IS NOT NULL AND date(m.released) > date() - duration('P5Y')
RETURN m.title, m.released, m.imdbRating
ORDER BY m.imdbRating DESC
LIMIT 5
error: Uses duration functions which have no TypeQL equivalent

question: Which 3 actors have a bio longer than 1000 characters and have acted in more than 5 movies?
cypher:
MATCH (a:Actor)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m:Movie)
WHERE size(a.bio) > 1000
WITH a, count(m) AS numMovies
WHERE numMovies > 5
RETURN a.name, a.bio, numMovies
ORDER BY numMovies DESC
LIMIT 3
error: Uses size() on string property - not directly supported

question: Show the top 3 movies that have been rated by the oldest users.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[r:RATED]-(u:User)
WITH m, u, r
ORDER BY u.born ASC
LIMIT 3
RETURN m.title AS movie, u.name AS user, r.rating AS rating
error: Schema mismatch: Question asks for oldest users (by birth date) but user entity has no born attribute in TypeQL schema. Only person entity has born attribute. Cannot correctly convert this query.

question: List the first 5 movies that have been rated by users from more than 10 different countries.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[r:RATED]-(u:User)
WITH m, count(DISTINCT u.name) AS numCountries
WHERE numCountries > 10
RETURN m.title
LIMIT 5
error: Schema mismatch: Question asks about user countries but User entity has no country attribute. Cypher counts distinct user names (misleadingly named numCountries) which cannot accurately answer the question about geographic diversity.

question: Show the first 3 movies that have been rated by the youngest users.
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[r:RATED]-(u:User)
WITH m, u, r
ORDER BY u.born DESC, r.timestamp
RETURN m.title AS movie, u.name AS user
LIMIT 3
error: Schema mismatch: Cypher query sorts by u.born (user birth date) to find youngest users, but TypeQL user entity does not have a born attribute. Only person entity has born. Cannot correctly answer the question.

question: Which 5 movies have the most distinct posters on IMDb?
cypher:
MATCH (m:Movie)
WHERE m.poster IS NOT NULL
RETURN m.title, m.poster
ORDER BY m.poster
LIMIT 5
error: Schema mismatch: Question asks for movies with most distinct posters, but schema defines poster as single-cardinality attribute (each movie has at most one poster). Counting distinct posters per movie is impossible - all movies would have count of 0 or 1. Original Cypher also fails to answer question correctly.

question: List all movies that have been rated by both male and female users.
error: Schema limitation: Question asks for movies rated by male and female users, but the recommendations schema has no gender attribute for users. The original Cypher uses hardcoded user names as a workaround but this does not actually answer the question about gender.
